title: Flickr’s experience with iOS 9
description: In the last couple of months, Apple has released new features as part of iOS 9 that allow a deeper integration between apps and the operating system. Among those features are Spotlight Search integration, Universal Links, and 3D Touch for …

title: Quickly schedule meetings
description:
Learn how to instantly schedule meetings without the back & forth! We make it effortless for recipients to confirm meetings. Your response rate will increase dramatically.
